title: The Wet Brush Detangling Shower Brush, Colors Vary
description: Eliminate tangles quickly and painlessly with Luxor Professional's The Wet Brush Detangling Shower Brush. This brush comb can be used on wet or dry hair and is perfect for all hair types. It features a soft, rubberized non-slip grip for a secure, comforta

title: Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Shampoo & Conditioner Combo Set (8.5 oz each)
description: Moisture Repair Shampoo and Conditioner are for hair that has been weakened or damaged by color, chemical processing or heat styling. They restore hair by bathing it in a highly concentrated formula rich in antioxidant argan oil, reconstructive keratin and fatty acids. Both products restore elasticity, moisture and manageability. The formulas are free of sulfates, phosphates and parabens, so they're safer for the environment and won't dry, fade or strip color-treated hair.

title: Sigma E15 - Flat Definer
description:
Unique Feature: Flat and sharp thin edge
Function: Sharp and precise application
Recommended Use: Press product along upper and lower lash lines to create an easy thin liner. Works with gel, liquid or powder products.
